text: Pen God Kawnan ne ak sek, Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk bin ne ak sek kɨlimɨŋal anɨb apil, Ownɨmɨn apil. Binɨb takaw anɨb awl nepal okok abe, kɨli agɨnɨgel, Ownɨmɨn agɨnɨgel. Nɨbop binɨb kuŋam mɨlep gek mɨdebɨm okok, nɨbi owɨm. Ñɨg nen gonɨmuŋ, apɨl ñɨg ñɨbɨl pelpel yenɨgabal ak, nɨbop ñen yokɨp dɨl ñɨŋɨnɨmɨb.
